channel.title: Demand on Coull Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Demand on Coull Documentation

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: The Coull Delivery Platform enables you to deliver a selection of effective and unique ad formats across the highest quality video inventory. Coull delivers ads via the IAB’s VAST/VPAID schema, which provides support for a number of different formats over video, including: Linear pre-roll, mid-roll and post-roll MP4 or FLV video ads Non-linear GIF/JPG/PNG, Flash (SWF), text, HTML, <iframe> and <script> overlay banners Interactive Flash and HTML5 VPAID ads

item.title: Coull Products for Demand Partners
item.description: PLACEholder Text Coull delivers ads via the IAB’s VAST/VPAID schema, which provides support for a number of different formats over video, including: Linear pre-roll, mid-roll and post-roll MP4 or FLV video ads Non-linear GIF/JPG/PNG, Flash (SWF), text, HTML, <iframe> and <script> overlay banners Interactive Flash and HTML5 VPAID ads For more detail, see Coull ad formats and creative specs You can purchase high-quality inventory in the Coull Ad Exchange in the following ways:
